thread.title: Dallas Tech Startup Food on the Fly to Present at 10th Annual Singular Research Investor Conference in Los Angeles September 17th
thread.title_full: Dallas Tech Startup Food on the Fly to Present at 10th Annual Singular Research Investor Conference in Los Angeles September 17th

author: Kylie Guthrie
title: Dallas Tech Startup Food on the Fly to Present at 10th Annual Singular Research Investor Conference in Los Angeles September 17th
text:
Food on the Fly Inc., a first to market technology based food delivery service in airports, today announced that cofounders Chad D. Cummings and Kylie J. Guthrie will be presenting at the Singular Research 10th Annual “Best of the Best of the Uncovereds” Conference on Thursday, September 17th at the Luxe Sunset Boulevard Hotel in Los Angeles. To request a one-on-one investor meeting with the management team, please contact the Food on the Fly Business Development group at (469) 630 1359 or your Singular Research representative. ABOUT SINGULAR RESEARCH
Singular Research aims to be the most trusted supplier of independent, trusted, single-source research on small-to-micro cap companies to the small-to-medium sized Hedge Fund manager. Singular Research provides quarterly updates for 20 to 50 companies and makes recommendations. Singular strives to achieve goals by:
Finding under or overvalued securities: Singular’s goal is to provide initiation reports and quarterly updates for approximately 40 micro to small cap companies. In most cases, Singular analysts research companies that are not covered by any other firms.
Singular provides honest advice: Independent analysts have no financial interest in the stocks covered. Analysts are compensated based on the accuracy of their research calls not through trading commissions or potential deal flow.
The Singular Research Coverage List track record since inception, August ’04, is up 255.3% through December 2014, compared with a gain of 111.2% for the Russell 2000 and 80.8% for the S&P 500 over the same period. For more information about Singular Research, please visit http://singularresearch.com .
ABOUT FOOD ON THE FLY INC.
Food on the Fly Inc. is the first end-to-end technology based delivery service that connects existing food and beverage outlets in the world’s largest airports with time-constrained passengers. The Company’s sophisticated order management system tracks customers’ flights to harmonize delivery times with arrivals and departures and is complemented by an intuitive, full-featured mobile application on the iOS platform. Food on the Fly is the first company to offer such a solution benefiting travelers, airports, and food and beverage concessionaries alike. For more information, please visit http://foodonthefly.com . Follow the Company on Twitter @FotFly.
